location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.260 of 1855 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of Kemball’s earlier letter (folios 110-11) relating to measures taken by the Persian Gulf squadron against the fugitive Humud bin Mujdell. Anderson writes that the Government entirely approves of Kemball’s proceedings in the matter.
